name: Warrior
description: A warrior is a person engaged or experienced in warfare or combat, especially within the context of a tribal or clan-based warrior culture society that recognizes a separate warrior class or caste. A warrior is one who is or has been engaged in warfare or combat.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Charge is a combat ability that allows a unit to move through enemy units and attack them on the same turn. Charge is a basic ability that all units have.
